faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about our services.
faq.a1: Landing pages are delivered in 5-7 business days. Complete websites take 10-15 business days, depending on complexity. We define the exact deadline in the initial briefing.
faq.q2: Is the website SEO optimized for Google?
faq.a2: Yes, all projects include on-page SEO from the start: heading structure, meta tags, optimized speed, and schema markup. Growth and Premium packages include complete local SEO with Google My Business.
faq.q3: Does it include domain and hosting?
faq.a3: We can help register the domain and set up hosting. We recommend options starting at €50/year that include everything. If you already have a domain, we integrate it seamlessly.
faq.q4: Can I edit the website afterward?
faq.a4: Yes, we deliver the website with a simple management panel or direct code access, as you prefer. We also offer support for changes.
faq.a5: Yes, we offer optional maintenance plans. The Premium package includes 3 months of support and adjustments. After that period, you can hire monthly maintenance or request one-off changes.
faq.q6: What do I need to send to get started?
faq.a6: You need to send: business information, text/content (or we create it), logo (if you have one), and images. We explain everything in detail during the briefing.
faq.a7: Landing pages start at €200 and complete websites from €400. The final price depends on features and pages. We always provide a personalized and free quote.
faq.q8: Do you work with businesses outside Portugal?
faq.a8: Yes, we work with businesses throughout Europe. Communication is in Portuguese or English, and we adapt SEO to the client's target market.
faq.a9: We include 2 rounds of revisions in all packages. Additional changes are quoted separately if needed.
faq.q10: How does the payment process work?
faq.a10: We typically ask for 50% to start and 50% on delivery. For larger projects, we can split into more installments. We accept bank transfer and MBWay.
